description: Shopify is an e-commerce platform enabling merchants to create online stores, manage products, and process payments with themes, apps, and integrated marketing tools

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_ADD_PRODUCT_TO_COLLECTION
capabilities.description: Adds a product to an existing *custom collection*, optionally specifying its `position` if the collection is manually sorted.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_COUNT_PRODUCT_IMAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves the total count of images for a Shopify product, useful for inventory management or display logic; the provided `product_id` must exist in the store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_CUSTOM_COLLECTION
capabilities.description: Creates a new custom collection in a Shopify store, requiring a unique title for manually curated product groupings (e.g., 'New Arrivals', 'Seasonal Specials').

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_CUSTOMER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new customer in Shopify. Use when you need to add a new customer record to the store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_ORDER
capabilities.description: Creates a new order in Shopify, typically requiring line items; if `customer_id` is provided, it must correspond to an existing customer.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Creates a new product in a Shopify store; a product title is generally required.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_PRODUCT_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new product image for a given product. Use when you need to add an image to a product by providing the image source URL or attachment.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_CREATE_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
capabilities.description: Creates a new metafield for a specific Shopify product.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_CUSTOM_COLLECTION
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a custom collection from a Shopify store using its `collection_id`; this action is irreversible and requires a valid, existing `collection_id`.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific, existing product from a Shopify store using its unique product ID; this action is irreversible.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_PRODUCT_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific image from a product in Shopify, requiring the `product_id` of an existing product and the `image_id` of an image currently associated with that product.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_DELETE_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific metafield from a Shopify product using the product ID and metafield ID.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ALL_CUSTOMERS
capabilities.description: Retrieves customer records from a Shopify store, with options for filtering, selecting specific fields, and paginating through the results.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_COLLECTION_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific Shopify collection by its `collection_id`, optionally filtering returned data to specified `fields`.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_COLLECTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of collects from a Shopify store, where a collect links a product to a custom collection.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_COLLECTS_COUNT
capabilities.description: Retrieves the total count of collects (product-to-collection associations) in a Shopify store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOM_COLLECTIONS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of custom collections from a Shopify store, optionally filtered by IDs, product ID, or handle.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOM_COLLECTIONS_COUNT
capabilities.description: Retrieves the total number of custom collections in a Shopify store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOMER
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific customer from a Shopify store, provided their valid and existing `customer_id`.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_CUSTOMER_ORDERS
capabilities.description: Retrieves all orders for a specific, existing customer in Shopify using their unique customer ID.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ORDER_LIST
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of orders from Shopify with optional filters and pagination.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ORDERSBY_ID
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific Shopify order by its unique ID, which must correspond to an existing order.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_ORDERS_WITH_FILTERS
capabilities.description: Retrieves Shopify orders filtered by dates and other filters. Uses server-side filtering.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Retrieves details for an existing Shopify product using its unique product ID.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific product image, identified by its ID and its associated product ID, from a Shopify store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_IMAGES
capabilities.description: Retrieves all images for a Shopify product, specified by its `product_id` which must correspond to an existing product.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific metafield for a Shopify product using the product ID and metafield ID.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCT_METAFIELDS
capabilities.description: Retrieves all metafields for a specific Shopify product. Metafields can be filtered by namespace and/or key.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of products from a Shopify store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCTS_COUNT
capabilities.description: Retrieves the total, unfiltered count of all products in a Shopify store.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCTS_IN_COLLECTION
capabilities.description: Retrieves all products within a specified Shopify collection, requiring a valid `collection_id`.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_PRODUCTS_PAGINATED
capabilities.description: Tool to list products with Shopify cursor-based pagination. Use when iterating over large product catalogs via the Link header.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GET_SHOP_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Retrieves comprehensive administrative information about the authenticated Shopify store, as defined by the Shopify API.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_GRAPH_QL_QUERY
capabilities.description: Executes a GraphQL query against the Shopify Admin API. This allows for flexible data retrieval and mutations including metafields operations.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_UPDATE_ORDER
capabilities.description: Updates the phone number for an existing Shopify order, identified by its ID; pass `phone=None` to remove the current phone number.

capabilities.name: SHOPIFY_UPDATE_PRODUCT_METAFIELD
capabilities.description: Updates an existing metafield for a specific Shopify product.
